casebody.data:
No. 22,

Misc.

Hudson v. North Carolina. Peti*813tioner pro se. Malcolm B. Seawell, Attorney General of North Carolina, T. W. Bruton and Ralph Moody, Assistant Attorneys General,- for respondent.

*812Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of' North Carolina granted. Case transferred to the appellate docket.
